author: Earliz
description:
One App, two possibilities: Earliz is a SaaS social project management platform, for professional (Earliz Enterprise) and individual (Earliz Open) users, providing the best of today's Lean management tools, such as Kanban, Scrum and Agile. Earliz Open Solution – Free and Premium accounts Turn your social network into a project team! Based on the best of today's Lean project management methods, such as Kanban, Scrum and Agile, Earliz Open will help you to increase quickly your productivity while listing, managing priorities and assigning easily project tasks to your friends. Debate online with your friends using blogs, forums, or chats, and adapt Earliz Open to all your specific needs, thanks to follow-up dashboards and Scrum dedicated tools. Earliz Enterprise Solution – 1-month free trial Increase teamwork as long as project monitoring! Earliz Enterprise provides you the best of today's Lean project management methods, such as Kanban, Scrum and Agile, incorporated into a private and secure Enterprise Social Network. Based on an intuitive interface, Earliz Enterprise helps project managers (or scrum masters) to organize, online or on mobile, project tasks and team planning, and assist each team member in his daily work. Moreover, Earliz Enterprise fully adapts to your current project management process, and provides lots of follow-up metrics, adapted to the different needs of team members and stakeholders, in order to adjust in real time priorities and planning. Features:
  • Productivity: Based on the best of today's Lean project management methods, such as Kanban and Agile, Earliz will help you to increase quickly your productivity while listing, managing priorities and assigning easily project task to your friends or colleagues.
  • Reactivity: Earliz fully adapts to your current project management process, Agile or milestones oriented, and provides lots of follow-up metrics automatically calculated online, adapted to the different needs of team members and stakeholders.
  • Social: Collaborate in real-time using social media! Invite your friends and colleagues, involve them in your projects wherever they are, and follow instantly, online or on your smartphone, all updates on tasks and discussions.
  • Communication: Centralize documents and discussions! Earliz gives you all the needed tools to share documents online, and to help team members to communicate immediate issues with the entire project community: blog, forum, chat, comments...
* Earliz use the Google Account Authentication, Google Calendar, Google Docs and Dropbox.
name: Earliz
